title: Communications Arts Logo Typefaces
content:
Does anyone recognize these two typefaces? One Caps condensed (COMMUNICATIONS ARTS) and the other close to Egizio (ca).

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819175330im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2013Header_logo_6228.gif)

thanks  
a,
author: adriano

comments.content: ‹ca› looks like a condensed Clarendon, not sure what font. ‹Communication arts› is likely Futura Condensed.
